home.subheading: Personal photography. A collection of my favourite shots.

info.heading: About us
info.subheading: I am a hobbyist photographer who appreciates simplicity - I tend to opt for more of a balanced and minimal composition in my photos.
info.paragraph1: I am always open for casual photoshoots or to collaborate on projects. Feel free to reach out to me via email at{' '} nickoless.lee@gmail.com or DM me on instagram.
